alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:41PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kimball and southeastern Laramie Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 240 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hillsdale, or 19 miles east of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluffs, Burns, Albin and Hillsdale. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 376 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
